name: I Have a Plan... To Take Down One of The Four Emperors!!
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text: Main Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} or {Supernovas} type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} or {Supernovas} type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
